    • lxml.sax.ElementTreeProducer: Produces SAX events for an element and children.
    • lxml.etree.ElementClassLookup: Superclass of Element class lookups.
      • lxml.etree.FallbackElementClassLookup: Superclass of Element class lookups with additional fallback.
        • lxml.pyclasslookup.PythonElementClassLookup: Element class lookup based on a subclass method.
    • lxml.sax.ElementTreeContentHandler: Build an lxml ElementTree from SAX events.
    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • lxml.etree.Error
          • lxml.sax.LxmlError: Main exception base class for lxml.
            • lxml.sax.SaxError: General SAX error.
            • lxml.etree.LxmlSyntaxError: Base class for all syntax errors.
              • lxml.ElementInclude.FatalIncludeError
        • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions that do not represent interpreter exiting.
          • exceptions.SyntaxError: Invalid syntax.
            • lxml.etree.LxmlSyntaxError: Base class for all syntax errors.
              • lxml.ElementInclude.FatalIncludeError
          • exceptions.AssertionError: Assertion failed.
    • lxml.builder.ElementMaker: Element generator factory.
    • lxml.etree._Element: Element class.
      • lxml.etree.ElementBase: All custom Element classes must inherit from this one.
        • lxml.tests.test_nsclasses.ETreeNamespaceClassesTestCase.default_class
        • lxml.tests.test_nsclasses.ETreeNamespaceClassesTestCase.bluff_class
